DefaultCaptureDeviceChanged: Multicast delegate triggered when default capture device changes
DefaultRenderDeviceChanged: Multicast delegate triggered when default render device changes
DeviceAdded: Multicast delegate triggered when a device is added
DeviceRemoved: Multicast delegate triggered when a device is removed
DeviceStateChanged: Multicast delegate triggered on device state change
DeviceSwitched: Multicast delegate triggered on device switch
